  • Does this instant premix contains caffeine?

    Yes, it does contain natural caffeine which is less in comparison to normal roasted coffee.

  • Can I use this coffee for facepack?

    No, as per recommendation it should not be used for topical application, for better results you can consume it orally.

  • Can I use this protein mix by grinding?

    Yes, it is a mix of seeds & nuts that you can grind in a grinder and use it for baking, or sprinkling in beverages.

  • Does this protein mix contains peanuts also, as I am allergic to peanuts?

    No, neuherbs Protein Mix does not contains peanuts.

  • Can male consume this hair-skin supplement?

    Yes! neuherbs Hair-Skin Vitamin is a unique formulation that contains 26 key ingredients- 9 vitamins & 8 minerals, 2 amino acids, with some special ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen Supporter, Primrose Oil, Lycopene, Turmeric Extract, Green Tea Extract and fortified with Glutathione. These ingredients are specifically added to provide the required nourishment to hair, skin & nails. This formulation is for all that means it can be used by both male and females.

  • Is this beauty supplement useful for reducing early -signs of aging?

    neuherbs Hair-Skin Vitamins is a unique combination of antioxidants like vitamin C, Collagen supporter, and herbs like turmeric extracts that works as antioxidants, and help fight free-radical damage in hair and skin cells and that can help reduce early signs of aging.

  • Does this rolled oats contains omega-3 from a non-veg source?

    No, neuherbs Rolled Oats contains Omega-3 from Flax Seeds that are known to be naturally rich in this healthy nutrient.

  • Does this vitamin C create acidity after consumption?

    No, it contains Calcium Ascorbate- a non-acidic form of vitamin C that is gentle on stomach and may not create acidity.

  • Is it a chewable vitamin C or need to consume with water?

    No, these are not chewable tablets, you need to consume it with water.

  • Does this vitamin C tablets taste sweet?

    No, it has natural taste of added herbs & vitamin blend and doesn't contains any added flavour.

  • Does this ashwagandha help in prolonged workout?

    Yes, Ashwagandha is a natural herb which is known to enhance stamina and energy levels which helps you in doing exeercise for prolonged duration.

  • Does this ashwagandha help in gaining weight?

    Stress is another reason that causes hurdle in weight gain. As ashwagandha aids in reducing stress and anxiety, in turn, it may help to maintain your weight when taken with calorie rich diet.

  • Should I take Vitamin C tablet alone or with food?

    If you want to maximize their iron absorption, you should take vitamin C with iron-rich foods or supplements.

  • What are the common symptoms of Vitamin C deficiency?

    The preliminary symptoms of Vitamin C deficiency are: Tiredness and weakness, Joint and muscle pains, Easily getting bruised and Tiny red-blue spots like bruises on the skin.
